root.name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2
root.description: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2 is a fighting game famous for its wacky hair and massive amounts of characters. The story mode follows the whole of the Dragon Ball Z series including the films.CharactersReturning CharactersKid Goku (Base, Great Ape)Goku (Base, Super Saiyan, Super Saiyan 2, Super Saiyan 3)Goku
